feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Supplier Lifecycle Management
feed.subtitle: SAP Supplier Lifecycle Management Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Unlinking the integration of an Ariba supplier from the SAP supplier
entry.content:
Hello experts,

I would like to validate with you if there is a possibility to unlink the integration of an supplier from Ariba with the supplier in SAP, that is, we have an XYZ supplier in Ariba integrated with a supplier in SAP ERP, and the intention is to "Remove" the integration of the XYZ supplier with the SAP ERP supplier. This way, the SAP supplier can be connected through the DFROUT process with a new Ariba supplier with the same characteristics as the XYZ supplier.

Context: We have a supplier in production that is experiencing technical issues in the registration questionnaire, but this supplier is integrated with a supplier in SAP. We want to check if there is a way to eliminate the integration of the supplier experiencing these issues with the supplier in SAP to create a new one in Ariba (with the same characteristics) and connect it through the DFROUT process (or if there is another procedure) with the SAP supplier.

I look forward to your response, and if you need more information, please feel free to let me know.

Thank you very much.

entry.title: How to use both Supplier Field mapping fields one is related to network and other is legal one?
entry.content:
Hi Everyone,

hope you all are doing great.

In SAP Ariba SLP , there are multiple Supplier field mapping like network.legal.address.line1 and network.contacts.line1 what is difference between legal network and simple network. As per my understanding it is mapped with the network and need more guidance related to it is linked with SAP ECC or SAP HANA, can you please guide me.

entry.title: Having SWIFT code mandatory in SLP
entry.content:
Hello community,

We are looking to make the SWIFT code mandatory in SLP bank repeatable section. We received response from support that this was not possible. We are now looking at other options e.g. having SWIFT code & IBAN outside the bank repeatable section. If you faced a similar issue in the past we would appreciate sharing how you worked around this limitation.

Kind regards,

Louis

entry.title: Why doesn't SLP recognize suppliers with special characters (such as 'Ñ') in their TAX ID?
entry.content: Some suppliers use the "Ñ" in their trade name or in the RFC (Tax ID/NIF), but currently SAP Ariba does not support it, especially for SLP. How do you handle this scenario? is there any recommendation?

entry.title: Ariba SLP to ERP Sync: Vendor account is not able to create in ECC
entry.content:
In Ariba, the Registration is completed and approved. The Synch is started, but it is showing "Integration in Progress" for long time.

Where to check any issues in the SAP ERP side? This is working in Testing system without any issues.

entry.title: Need help to get Supplier location deleted in Ariba when the BP vendor is blocked /deletion flag set
entry.content:
Hi Team,

We are facing an issue when the BP vendor record is set for deletion flag / Posting block in S4 & it should trigger the "Supplier Location delete & Remittance Location delete" file on the BADI - ARBCIG_MASTERDATA but it is not triggering any data in the arbcig_changedoc to send this file to Ariba to delete the respective supplier's location.

Appreciate any inputs to fix the above issue on the SLP - S4 integration / sync.

Thanks,

Chethan G K

entry.title: SAP Ariba Integration with S/4HANA Public Cloud for Business Partner replication using SOAP API's
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

we are integrated from Ariba to S/4 HANA Public Cloud using SOAP APIs using Managed Gateways Passthrough integration via BTP Master Data Integration.

  • We are created Instances services as Master Data Integration and Subscription services as Master Data Integration (Orchestration).
  • We have use this JSON below to create the service instance.

 

{
    "application": "s4",
    "businessSystemId": "<businessSystemId>", //Business System ID is SAP S/4HANA Cloud system this value is can be found under Communication systems tile and then filter by Own System.
    "enableTenantDeletion": false,
    "globalTenantId": "<subaccount Id under Service Key>",
    "logSys": "<Same logsys configure in S4PC>",
    "writePermissions": [
        {
            "entityType": "sap.odm.businesspartner.BusinessPartner"
        },
        {
            "entityType": "sap.odm.businesspartner.BusinessPartnerRelationship"
        }
    ],
    "xs-security": {
        "xsappname": "<a unique v4 UUID can be used>",
        "authorities": [
            "$XSMASTERAPPNAME.BPCommonRead",
            "$XSMASTERAPPNAME.BPSensitiveDataRead"
        ]
    }
}

 

  • Created new project in managed gateway to connection from Managed Gateway to MDI (BTP). We are encountering a 404 error while testing the connection. 

    Configure in CIG inbound URL is https://<one-mds.cfapps.<region>.hana.ondemand.com>/businesspartner/v0/soap/BusinessPartnerBulkReplicateRequestIn?tenantId=<identityzone>

    For basic authentication, specify the following:
    User: Value of clientid from the Service key
    Password: Value of clientsecret from the Service key
  • While triggering business partner replication from S4PC its successfully reaching BTP but not in Ariba (Manage Gateway).
  • How to send master data from MDI to Ariba solution?
  • Can you please share configuration guide for this?

Could you please help me on this Integration connection.

Below are the links we referenced and created the MDI integration.

About Supplier Data Integration with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Using SAP Master Data Integration | SAP Help Portal

Configuring SOAP Outbound Destinations to the SAP Integration Suite, managed gateway for spend management and SAP Business Network in SAP Master Data Integration | SAP Help Portal

https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-blogs-by-sap/configuring-sap-master-data-integration-service-for-business-partner/ba-p/13543017

Thanks & Regards,

Thouheed

entry.title: Cadeia de suprimentos
entry.content:
This Record of Achievement verifies that the learner has completed the SAP learning journey "Applying Supply Chain Execution in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition" and passed all the quiz questions on the SAP learning site. The learner can understand Supply Chain Execution processes, execute a Supply Chain Execution inbound process, and execute a Supply Chain Execution outbound process.
View my verified achievement from Sap.

entry.title: How to clear forecast when there is no history in SAP IBP
entry.content:
Hi IBP experts,

Can someone please advise as to how to approach a solution for the following scenario? 

So, I have noticed that there are times, when we run stat forecast models, we come across scenario from time to time where, say we had good history, so it generated forecast output. sometimes as time passes given SKU/Customer would have less history for whatever reason. What I have noticed is that, sometime the output in forecast kf the data will clear as there is not enough history and sometime the forecast kf in future does not get cleared when the history drops. Is there a way to automate this where system recognizes that there is not history and so if there is a forecast, it needs to be cleared.

entry.title: Question on Supplier Profile Summary on SLP (NGSM-2959)
entry.content:
Hi the (NGSM-2959) feature can only be installed on client realms (not on partner realms) which makes it impossible to test it on our partner realm.

Is it possible to display several operational scores (eg one logistic score and one quality score) or can there be only one ? 

Thanks in advance for your answer

Regards

Isabelle

SAP Supplier Lifecycle Management

entry.title: SAP MII/MES Evolution: What’s Your Next Step?
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

As we look to the future of our manufacturing operations, my team’s excited to explore new possibilities with SAP Digital Manufacturing and other innovative solutions to keep our shop floors thriving. Big thanks to SAP for supporting us as we plan this journey!

What’s your team’s approach to evolving your manufacturing systems? Are you diving into SAP’s latest tools, checking out other platforms, or just starting to brainstorm? Share your ideas, successes, or questions—let’s inspire each other! 🚀

#SAPMII #SAPMES #DigitalManufacturing

entry.title: Published API for simulating supplier invoice posting in S4/HANA private edition
entry.content:
Hi All,

Are there any published APIs or ways where we can simulate the posting of a supplier Invoice in MIRO or FB60 or ? Our client has an external system through which the supplier invoice data would be posted and prior to that would want to simulate the posting. Any suggestions would be really appreciated.

Regards,
Shravan Chintapatla

entry.title: Supplier Visibility Control in Shared SAP Ariba SLP Environment
entry.content:
Hi All,
Hope you're doing well!

I have a query regarding supplier visibility in SAP Ariba SLP, and I’d be grateful for guidance from the community experts.

Scenario:
Two large companies have formed a collaboration and are operating under a shared SAP Ariba SLP setup. We would like to understand if it’s possible to:

  • Restrict each company’s users to view only their respective suppliers, and

  • Allow visibility to a limited set of common suppliers for both companies.

Is such a configuration supported within Ariba SLP? If so, what are the recommended approaches—such as realm design, permission controls, or custom attributes?

Appreciate your inputs, suggestions, or any relevant best practices.

Best regards,
Sai

entry.title: Query on Supplier Management – Total Spend Visibility in 360° Profile
entry.content:
Hi All,
Hope everyone is doing great.

I have a query regarding supplier management in SAP Ariba Supplier Lifecycle & Performance (SLP) integrated with S/4HANA.

Specifically, is it possible to make the total spend for a supplier visible on their 360° supplier profile?

  • For example: displaying the aggregated historical spend directly in the 360° view for quick reference.

  • If this is possible, are there standard configuration options, or would it require custom integration/reporting?

I’d greatly appreciate any inputs, suggestions, or relevant best practices from those who have implemented similar visibility.

Best regards,
Sai

entry.title: GIRO Bank Account Setup in Ariba SLP for Sweden Supplier
entry.content:
I’m reaching out to get the insights of how GIRO bank accounts are handled within Ariba Supplier Lifecycle and Performance (SLP), specifically for suppliers based in Sweden.

From my understanding, Sweden uses GIRO systems for domestic payments in SEK. These are not traditional bank accounts or IBANs, but rather payment routing numbers linked to bank accounts. 

  • Does Ariba SLP support capturing GIRO account details for Sweden-based suppliers?
  • Are there specific fields or formats recommended for entering these account types?
  • Are there any SAP best practices or localization settings we should follow to ensure compliance and proper validation?
  • How is this handled for other SAP clients onboarding Sweden-based suppliers in SLP? Any examples or references would be helpful.
